## Setup Linting and Formatting

## Task
Configure all linters and code formatters for the project.

## Sub-tasks
1. Configure ESLint for TypeScript/JavaScript/TSX/JSX
2. Add Prettier for code formatting
3. Add markdownlint for Markdown files
4. Add YAML linting
5. Add JSON linting/validation
6. Create lint scripts in package.json
